publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3597 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion-That the Parliament agrees as a revision to the Business Programme agreed on 14 November 2002- Thursday 21 November 2002 after- "followed by Financial Resolution in respect of Title Conditions (Scotland) Bill" insert- "followed by Executive Debate on Extradition Bill - UK Legislation" Supported by: Euan Robson*
